pkgmetadata.longdescription: LS-PLS Models // Implements the LS-PLS (least squares - partial least squares) method described in for instance Jrgensen, K., Segtnan, V. H., Thyholt, K., Ns, T. (2004) A Comparison of Methods for Analysing Regression Models with Both Spectral and Designed Variables. Journal of Chemometrics, 18(10), 451--464.
